values: To shave means to cut the hairs on one’s face with a sharp tool.
My father shaves his face every day because he doesn’t want a beard.
vi. 剃须，剃毛 vt. 剃，削去；修剪；切成薄片；掠 n. 刮脸，剃胡子；修面；<口>侥幸逃过，幸免；剃刀，刮刀

- vt. 剃；修面；掠过
- vi. 剃；刮脸；勉强通过
- n. 修面；幸免；刮胡子

shaved, shaved, shaven  
shaving, shaves
